GV06vargs_u:9: paratantrotpattir dakṣiṇāgnāv āhitāgniḥ kurvīta śālāgnāv anāhitāgniḥ //
GV06vargs_u:10: gomayena gocarmamātraṃ caturasraṃ sthaṇḍilam upalipyeṣumātraṃ tasmin lakṣaṇaṃ kurvīta satyasadasīti paścārdhād udīcīṃ lekhāṃ likhati /
GV06vargs_u:19: parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya tūṣṇīm idhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya grāgagrair dakṣiṇārambhair udaksaṃsthairayugmair dhātubhiḥ stṛṇāti // VGrs_1.9
GV06vargs_u:22_0: samāv apracchinnaprāntau darbhau prādeśamātrau pavitre stho vaiṣṇavye ityoṣadhyā
GV06vargs_u:22_1: chittvā viṣṇormanasā pūte stha ity adbhis trir unmṛjya prokṣaṇīr dharmaiḥ saṃskṛtya
GV06vargs_u:22_2: praṇītāṃ praṇīya nirvapaṇaprokṣaṇasaṃvapanam iti yathādevataṃ carum adhiśritya sruksruvaṃ
GV06vargs_u:22_3: pramṛjyābhyukṣyāgnau pratāpyāditir asi nācchinnapattrety ājyam agnāv adhiśrayati //
GV06vargs_u:24: pari vājapatir ityājyahaviś ca triḥ paryagnikaroti // VGrs_1.14
GV06vargs_u:25: devas tvā savitotpunātv ityājyaṃ śrapayati // VGrs_1.15
GV06vargs_u:26: tūṣṇīm idhmābarhir viprokṣya yathā mnātam abhiparistṛṇāti // VGrs_1.16
GV06vargs_u:31: brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā yunajmi tveti ca yojayitvā nahy ayukto havyaṃ vahata iti ha vijñāyate // VGrs_1.22
GV06vargs_u:33: yukto vaha jātavedaḥ purastādidaṃ viddhi kriyamāṇaṃ yatheha /
GV06vargs_u:34: tvaṃ bhiṣagbheṣajasyāsi goptā tvayā prasūtā gāmaśvaṃ pūruṣaṃ sanema /
GV06vargs_u:37: viśvā agne tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva /
GV06vargs_u:42: abhighārya yaddevataṃ haviḥ syāttac ca juhuyād yathādevataṃ yathādevatayā carcā // VGrs_1.26
GV06vargs_u:46: iḍām agna iti sviṣṭakṛtam uttarārdhapūrvārdhe juhuyāt // VGrs_1.28
GV06vargs_u:56: imaṃ stanaṃ madhumantaṃ dhayāpāṃ prapīnamagne salilasya madhye /
GV06vargs_u:57: utsaṃ juṣasva madhumantam ūrmiṃ samudryaṃ sadanam āviśasva /
GV06vargs_u:71: prāṅmukham udaṅmukhaṃ vā sūtikālayaṃ kalpayitvā dhruvaṃ prapadye śubhaṃ prapadya āśāṃ prapadya iti kāle prapādayet // VGrs_2.1
GV06vargs_u:72: reto mūtramiti cyāvanībhyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim abhimṛśet /
GV06vargs_u:74: putraṃ jātam anvakṣaṃ snātaṃ na mātopahanyād ā mantraprayogāt // VGrs_2.3
GV06vargs_u:75_0: agner abhyāhitasya parisamūḍhasya paristīrṇasya paścād ahate vāsasi kumāraṃ prākśirasam
GV06vargs_u:75_1: uttānaṃ saṃveśya palāśasya madhyamaṃ parṇaṃ praveṣṭya tenāsya karṇāv ājapet bhūs
GV06vargs_u:75_2: tvayi dadhānīti dakṣiṇe bhuvas tvayi dadhānīti savye /
GV06vargs_u:77: bhūr bhuvaḥ svas tvayi dadhānīti savye // VGrs_2.4
GV06vargs_u:79: aśmā bhava paraśur bhava hiraṇyam astṛtaṃ bhava /
GV06vargs_u:81: ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:83: yatra śete tadabhimṛśet veda te bhūmi hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam /
GV06vargs_u:84: vedāmṛtasya devā māhaṃ putryam aghaṃ rudam /
GV06vargs_u:86: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā vyāhṛtibhiś catasra ājyāhutīr juhuyāt /
GV06vargs_u:88: kāṃsye camase vāhūtisampātān avanīya tasmin suvarṇaṃ saṃnighṛṣya vyāhṛtibhiḥ kumāraṃ catuḥ prāśayet /
GV06vargs_u:89: atyantam eke suvarṇaprāśanam udake nighṛṣyā dvādaśavarṣatāyāḥ // VGrs_2.8
GV06vargs_u:93: sviṣṭakṛte hutvā prāyaścittāhutīśca samidhamādhāya paryukṣati // VGrs_2.10
GV06vargs_u:99: sūtikālayaṃ yathākālaṃ samantād udakena pariṣiñcet // VGrs_2.13
GV06vargs_u:101_0: evam eva daśamyāṃ kṛtvā pitā mātā ca putrasya nāma dadhyatām ghoṣavadādyantarantasthaṃ
GV06vargs_u:101_1: dīrghābhiniṣṭānāntaṃ kṛtaṃ na taddhitaṃ dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā tyaktvā pitur
GV06vargs_u:103: nāmaiva kanyāyāḥ akāravyavadhānam ākārāntam ayugmākṣaraṃ nadīnakṣatracandrasūryapūṣadevadattarakṣitāvarjam navanītena pāṇī pralipya somasya tvā dyumnenety enamabhimṛśet // VGrs_3.4
GV06vargs_u:104: sarveṣu kumārakarmasv āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ prājāpatyo vā // VGrs_3.5
GV06vargs_u:106: saṃvatsaraṃ mātāpitarau na māṃsam aśnīyātām // VGrs_3.7
GV06vargs_u:107: putrasya jātadante yajetāgniṃ gavā paśunā vā // VGrs_3.8
GV06vargs_u:108: viproṣitaḥ pratyetya putrasya mūrdhānaṃ trir ājighret paśūnāṃ tvā hiṃkāreṇābhijighrāmīti //
GV06vargs_u:109: jātakarmavaddhastāṅguliṃ praveṣṭya tenāsya karṇāv ājapet // VGrs_3.10
GV06vargs_u:111: agnidhanvantarī putravratī chāgameṣābhyām iṣṭvā dīrghāṇāṃ vyāhṛtibhiḥ kumāraṃ catuḥ prāśayet
GV06vargs_u:113: kumārakarmāṇi śukla udagayane puṇye nakṣatre navamīvarjam /
GV06vargs_u:114: sarva ṛtavo vivāhe 'māghacaitrau māsau parihāpyottaraṃ ca naidāgham //
GV06vargs_u:119: agnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇato 'gner
GV06vargs_u:121: athainam abhimantrayate hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucaya iti catasṛbhiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:123: śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GV06vargs_u:125: priyāḥ śaṃ na āpo dhanvanyāḥ śaṃ naḥ santu nūpyāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:126: śaṃ naḥ samudryā āpaḥ śam u naḥ santu kūpyāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:127: śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā /
GV06vargs_u:128: śaṃ na indraś cāgniś ca śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ / iti /
GV06vargs_u:130: tāsām udakārthān kurvīta paryukṣaṇe 'bhyundane snāpane ca // VGrs_4.3
GV06vargs_u:131: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā agnā āyūṃṣi pavasa iti saptabhiḥ sapta hutvā // VGrs_4.4
GV06vargs_u:133: ye keśinaḥ prathame sattram āsata yebhir āvṛtaṃ yadidaṃ virājati /
GV06vargs_u:139: uṣṇena vāya udakenedhīti taptā itarābhiḥ saṃsṛjya ārdradānava stha jīvadān avasthondatīriṣamāvadety apo 'bhimantrya dakṣiṇaṃ keśāntam abhyundyāt /
GV06vargs_u:143: dakṣiṇasmin keśānte darbham ūrdhvāgraṃ nidadhāti // VGrs_4.9
GV06vargs_u:145: svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīr iti kṣureṇābhinidadhāti // VGrs_4.11
GV06vargs_u:146: yenāvapatsavitā kṣureṇa somasya rājño varuṇasya vidvān /
GV06vargs_u:147: tena brahmāṇo vapatedam asyāyuṣmān ayaṃ jaradaṣṭir yathāsat /
GV06vargs_u:150: dakṣiṇato mātānyā vāvidhavānaḍuhena gomayenābhūmigatān keśān parigṛhṇīyāt
GV06vargs_u:151: mā te keśān anugād varca etattathā dhātā dadhātu te /
GV06vargs_u:152: tubhyamindro varuṇo bṛhaspatiḥ savitā varca ādadhuḥ /
GV06vargs_u:154: tena dharmeṇa punar apo 'bhimantryāparaṃ keśāntam abhyundyād uttaraṃ ca //
GV06vargs_u:155: anyau tu pravapanau yena pūṣā bṛhaspater agner indrasya cāyuṣe 'vapat /
GV06vargs_u:158: yena bhūyaś caratyayaṃ jyok ca paśyasi sūryam /
GV06vargs_u:159: tena te vapāmy āyuṣe dīrghāyutvāya suślokyāya suvarcase /
GV06vargs_u:161: yat kṣureṇa parcayatā supeśasā vaptar vapasi keśān /
GV06vargs_u:163: iti lohāyasaṃ kṣuraṃ keśavāpāya prayacchati // VGrs_4.17
GV06vargs_u:164: yathārthaṃ keśayatnān kurvanti dakṣiṇataḥ kapardā vasiṣṭhānām ubhayato
GV06vargs_u:167: tryāyuṣaṃ kaśyapasya jamadagnes tryāyuṣam agastyasya tryāyuṣam /
GV06vargs_u:168: yad devānāṃ tryāyuṣaṃ tan me astu śatāyuṣam /
GV06vargs_u:170: parigṛhya gomayena keśān uttarapūrvasyāṃ gṛhasya mūṣyām antarā gehāt paladaṃ ca nidadhyāt
GV06vargs_u:172: uptvāya keśāntān varuṇāya rājño bṛhaspatiḥ savitā viṣṇurindraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:173: tebhyo nidhānaṃ mahad anvavindann antarā dyāvāpṛthivī apa svaḥ // iti /
GV06vargs_u:176: pakṣmaguṇaṃ tilapiśitaṃ ca keśavāpāya prayacchati // VGrs_4.23
GV06vargs_u:186: tato garbhaikādaśeṣu kṣatriyaṃ garbhadvādaśeṣu vaiśyam // VGrs_5.2
GV06vargs_u:187: prākṣoḍaśād varṣād brāhmaṇasyāpatitā sāvitrī dvāviṃśāt kṣatriyasya caturviṃśād vaiśyasya /
GV06vargs_u:189: nainān yājayeyur nādhyāpayeyur na vivaheyur na vivāhayeyuḥ // VGrs_5.3
GV06vargs_u:192: kumāraṃ paryuptinaṃ snātam abhyaktaśirasam upasparśanakalpe nopaspṛṣṭam agnerdakṣiṇato 'vasthāpya dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam iti dadhnaḥ kumāraṃ triḥ
GV06vargs_u:194: iyaṃ duruktāt paribādhamānā varṇaṃ pavitraṃ punatī na āgāt /
GV06vargs_u:195: prāṇāpānābhyāṃ balam ābhajantī śivā devī subhagā mekhaleyam /
GV06vargs_u:196: ṛtasya goptrī tapasas tarutrī ghnatī rakṣaḥ sahamānā arātīḥ /
GV06vargs_u:197: sā mā samantam anuparyehi bhadre dhartāras te subhage mekhale mā riṣāma /
GV06vargs_u:198: iti mauñjīṃ triguṇāṃ triḥ parivītāṃ mekhalām ābadhnīte /
GV06vargs_u:199: maurvīṃ dhanurjyāṃ kṣatriyasya śāṇīṃ vaiśyasya // VGrs_5.7
GV06vargs_u:200: upavītam asi yajñasya tvopavītenopavyayāmīti yajñopavītam // VGrs_5.8
GV06vargs_u:201: yā akṛtan yā atanvan yā avāyan yā avāharan /
GV06vargs_u:202: yāś cāgnā devīr antān abhito 'tanvata tāstvā devīr jarase saṃvyayantām /
GV06vargs_u:203: āyuṣmān ayaṃ paridhatta vāsaḥ paridhatta varcaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:205: śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīr vasūni cāyyo vibhajāya jīyān /
GV06vargs_u:206: ity ahataṃ vāsa ācchādya mitrasya cakṣurdharaṇaṃ balīyastejo yaśasvi sthaviraṃ ca dhṛṣṇu /
GV06vargs_u:207: anāhanasyaṃ vasanaṃ cariṣṇu parīdaṃ vājyaṃ vājinaṃ dadhe 'ham /
GV06vargs_u:209: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvāṣṭau jaṭākaraṇīyān juhuyāt // VGrs_5.10
GV06vargs_u:212_0: kālāya vāṃ gotrāya vāṃ jaitrāya vām audbhetrāya vām annādyāya vām avanenijed ity
GV06vargs_u:212_1: udakenāñjaliṃ pūrayitvā sukṛtāya vāmiti pāṇī prakṣālya idamahaṃ duryamanyā niṣplāvayāmīty
GV06vargs_u:212_2: ācamya niṣṭhīvati bhrātṛvyāṇāṃ sapatnānām ahaṃ bhūyāsam uttama iti dvitīyam // VGrs_5.14
GV06vargs_u:213: prātar jitaṃ bhagamugraṃ huvema vayaṃ putram aditeryo vidhartā /
GV06vargs_u:214: ādhraś cidyaṃ mantamānasturaś cidrājā cidyaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīmahīty āha /
GV06vargs_u:216: brahmacaryam upāgāmupa mā hvayasveti brūyāt // VGrs_5.16
GV06vargs_u:217: ehi brahmopehi brahma brahma tvā sa brahmasantam upanayāmy aham asāv iti // VGrs_5.17
GV06vargs_u:219: devasya te savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ hastaṃ
GV06vargs_u:220: gṛhṇāmy aham asāv ity asya hastaṃ dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇam uttānam abhīvāṅguṣṭham abhīva lomāni gṛhṇīyāt // VGrs_5.19
GV06vargs_u:221: mām evānvetu te mano māmevāpi tvam anvihi /
GV06vargs_u:222: agnau dhṛtamiva dīpyatāṃ hṛdayaṃ tava yan mayi /
GV06vargs_u:224: pṛṣṭhato 'sya pāṇim anvavahṛtya hṛdayadeśam anvārabhya japet prāṇānāṃ
GV06vargs_u:225: granthir asi sa mā visrasad iti /
GV06vargs_u:227: gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ havāmahe kaviṃ kavīnām upamaśravastamam /
GV06vargs_u:228: jyeṣṭharājaṃ brahmāṇaṃ brahmaṇaspata ā naḥ kṛṇvann ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam /
GV06vargs_u:231: adhīhi bho ity upaviśya japati // VGrs_5.24
GV06vargs_u:232: prabhujya dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pāṇī saṃdhāya darbhahastāv oṃ ity uktvā vyāhṛtīḥ sāvitrīṃ cānubrūyāt
GV06vargs_u:235: ā devo yātu savitā suratna iti triṣṭubhaṃ kṣatriyāya /
GV06vargs_u:238: pālāśaṃ daṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchati naiyagrodhaṃ kṣatriyāyāśvatthaṃ vaiśyāya /
GV06vargs_u:240: yathā tvaṃ suśravaḥ suśravā asy evam ahaṃ suśravaḥ suśravā bhūyāsam /
GV06vargs_u:241: yathā tvaṃ devānāṃ vedasya nidhigopo 'syevamahaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ brahmaṇo nidhigopo bhūyāsamiti pratigṛhṇāti // VGrs_5.27
GV06vargs_u:242: ūrdhvakapālo brāhmaṇasya kamaṇḍaluḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ kṣatriyasya nicalkalo vaiśyasya /
GV06vargs_u:245: iti pratigṛhṇāmīti pratigṛhya bhaikṣyacaryaṃ caret bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehīti brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati madhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ bhavaty antyāṃ vaiśyaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:251: sāvitrīṃ trir adhītya adhvanām adhvapate svastyasyādhvanaḥ pāramaśīya /
GV06vargs_u:252: yā medhā apsaraḥsu gandharveṣu ca yanmanaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:253: yā medhā daivī mānuṣī sā mām āviśatām iha /
GV06vargs_u:260: taṃ mā saṃsṛja varcaseti mukhaṃ parimṛjīta // VGrs_5.33
GV06vargs_u:264: sa me śraddhāṃ ca medhāṃ ca jātavedāḥ prayacchatu /
GV06vargs_u:267: tejasā mā samaṅgdhi varcasā mā samaṅgdhi brahmavarcasena mā samaṅgdhīti mukhaṃ parimṛjīta āyurdhā agne 'sīti yathārūpaṃ gātrāṇi saṃmṛśati // VGrs_5.36
GV06vargs_u:268: iha dhṛtiriti paryāyair aṃsaṃ grīvāścārcirālabhya rucaṃ no dhehīti lalāṭam abhimṛśet // VGrs_5.37
GV06vargs_u:270: gurave brahmaṇe ca varam uttarāsaṅgaṃ ca dadāti // VGrs_5.39
GV06vargs_u:273_0: vyuṣṭe dvādaśarātre ṣaḍrātre vā grāmāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā diśam upaniṣkramya paścāt
GV06vargs_u:273_1: palāśasya yajñīyasya vā vṛkṣasya sāvitreṇa sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya
GV06vargs_u:273_2: purastāt sviṣṭakṛto mekhalāṃ daṇḍaṃ cāpsu prāsyet // VGrs_5.42
GV06vargs_u:278: mārgavāsāḥ saṃhatakeśaḥ bhaikṣācaryavṛttiḥ saśalkadaṇḍaḥ saptamauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ dhārayed ācāryasyāpratikūlaḥ sarvakārī // VGrs_6.3
GV06vargs_u:293: adhaḥśāyī ācāryādhīnavṛttiḥ tannisargād aśanam ayācitaṃ lavaṇam //
GV06vargs_u:296: acchannavastrāṃ vivṛtāṃ striyaṃ na paśyet // VGrs_6.20
GV06vargs_u:304: raktaṃ vasanakambalam aiṇeyaṃ brāhmaṇasya rauravaṃ kṣatriyasya ājaṃ vaiśyasya // VGrs_6.28
GV06vargs_u:305: etena dharmeṇa dvādaśavarṣāṇy ekavede brahmacaryaṃ caret /
GV06vargs_u:306: caturviṃśati dvayoḥ ṣaṭtriṃśati trayāṇām aṣṭācatvāriṃśati sarveṣām /
GV06vargs_u:308: malajñurabalaḥ kṛśaḥ snātvā sa sarvaṃ labhate yat kiṃcin manasepsitamiti
GV06vargs_u:310: mantrabrāhmaṇānyadhītya kalpaṃ mīmāṃsāṃ ca yājñiko 'dhītya vaktraṃ padaṃ smṛtiṃ caicchikaḥ tau snātakau // VGrs_6.33
GV06vargs_u:314: antarjānu bāhū kṛtvā trir ācāmet // VGrs_6.35
GV06vargs_u:319: āghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā caturhot n svakarmaṇo juhuyāt /
GV06vargs_u:320: saha pañcahotrā ṣaḍḍhotrā ca saptahotāram antataḥ // VGrs_7.2
GV06vargs_u:321: hutvā vrataṃ pradāyādito dvāv anuvākāv anuvācayet // VGrs_7.3
GV06vargs_u:322: athāgnivratāśvamedhikī dīkṣā saṃvatsaraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ vā // VGrs_7.4
GV06vargs_u:323: ākūtamagnimiti ṣaḍḍhutvā vrataṃ pradāyādito 'ṣṭāv anuvākān anuvācayet //
GV06vargs_u:324: triṣavaṇam udakam āharet trīṃs trīn kumbhān // VGrs_7.6
GV06vargs_u:326: bhasmani śayīta karīṣe sikatāsu bhūmau vā // VGrs_7.8
GV06vargs_u:328: saṃvatsare samāpte ghṛtavatāpūpenāgnim iṣṭvā vātsapraṃ vācayet //
GV06vargs_u:329: smārtena yāvad adhyayanaṃ kāṇḍavrataviśeṣā homārthaś cādyantayor juhuyāt
GV06vargs_u:340: tiṣṭhed ahani rātrāv āsīta vāgyataḥ // VGrs_7.19
GV06vargs_u:350: aham iddhi pituḥ pari medhā amṛtasya jagrabha /
GV06vargs_u:353: apvo nāmāsi tasya te joṣṭraṃ gameyam /
GV06vargs_u:354: aham iddhi pituḥ pari medhā amṛtasya jagrabha /
GV06vargs_u:364: tasyāste tasya te ity anuṣajet // VGrs_8.3
GV06vargs_u:369: udyujyamānāya svāheti jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya purastāt sviṣṭakṛto
GV06vargs_u:370: 'ntevāsināṃ yogam icchann atha japati ṛtaṃ vadiṣyāmi satyaṃ vadiṣyāmi brahma vadiṣyāmi tan mām avatu tadvaktāram avatv avatu māmavatu vaktāram /
GV06vargs_u:371: vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitam āvir āyur mayi dhehi /
GV06vargs_u:374: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svariti darbhapāṇis triḥ sāvitrīm adhītyāditaś ca trīn anuvākāṃs tathāṅgānām ekaikam /
GV06vargs_u:377: sataḥ valīkakṣāraprabhṛti varṣaṃ na vidyotamāne na stanayatīti śrutiḥ ākālikaṃ devatu mūlaṃ vidyuddhanvolkātyakṣarāḥ śabdāḥ ācāreṇānye //
GV06vargs_u:378_0: ardhapañcamān māsān adhītya pañcārdhaṣaṣṭhān vā dīkṣaṇāyanaṃ vādhītyāthotsṛjanty
GV06vargs_u:378_1: etena dharmeṇa ṛtam avādiṣaṃ satyam avādiṣaṃ brahmāvādiṣaṃ tan mām āvīt tadvaktāram
GV06vargs_u:378_2: āvīd āvīn mām āvīd vaktāram vāṅ me manasi pratiṣṭhitā mano me vāci pratiṣṭhitam āvir
GV06vargs_u:381: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ity antam adhītya ko vo vimuñcatīti ca // VGrs_8.8
GV06vargs_u:387: brahmacārī sucaritī medhāvī karmakṛd dhanadaḥ priyaḥ vidyayā vā vidyām anvicchan // VGrs_8.12
GV06vargs_u:395: yat kṣureṇa parcayatā supeśasā vaptar vapasi keśaśmaśrūn /
GV06vargs_u:401: chandasy arthān buddhvā snāsyan gāṃ kārayet // VGrs_9.7
GV06vargs_u:403_0: āpo hi ṣṭheti tisṛbhiḥ hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucaya iti catasṛbhiḥ snātvāhate vāsasī paridadhīta
GV06vargs_u:403_1: vasvasi vasumantaṃ māṃ kuru sauvarcasāya vāṃ tejase brahmavarcasāya paridadhānīti //
GV06vargs_u:405: mālāmābadhnīte yām aśvinau dhārayetāṃ bṛhatīṃ puṣkarasrajam /
GV06vargs_u:409: pratiṣṭhe stho devate mā mā saṃtāptam ityupānahau // VGrs_9.13
GV06vargs_u:415: āmantrya gurūn gurvadhīnāṃśca svān gṛhānvrajet // VGrs_9.18
GV06vargs_u:416: pratiṣiddham aparayā dvārā niḥsaraṇaṃ malavadvāsasā saha sambhāṣā rajasvadvāsasā saha śayyā gor guror duruktavacanam asthāne śayanaṃ sthānaṃ smayanaṃ yānaṃ gānaṃ smaraṇamiti /
GV06vargs_u:423: vinītakrodhaḥ saharṣaḥ saharṣīṃ bhāryāṃ vindetānanyapūrvāṃ yavīyasīm //
GV06vargs_u:425: ūrdhvaṃ saptamāt pitṛbandhubhyaḥ pañcamān mātṛbandhubhyo bījinaśca //
GV06vargs_u:428: pañca vivāhakārakāṇi bhavanti vittaṃ rūpaṃ vidyā prajñā bāndhavamiti //
GV06vargs_u:432: prajñāyāṃ tu bāndhave ca vivadante // VGrs_10.6
GV06vargs_u:433: anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yantu no vareyam /
GV06vargs_u:434: samaryamā saṃ bhago no 'nunīyāt saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamamastu devāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:438: caturo loṣṭān āharet sītāloṣṭaṃ vediloṣṭaṃ gomayaloṣṭaṃ śmaśānaloṣṭaṃ ca // VGrs_10.9
GV06vargs_u:441: asaṃspṛṣṭāṃ dharmeṇopayaccheta brāhmeṇa śaulkena vā // VGrs_10.11
GV06vargs_u:443: ubhayāṃs tejanīṣv āsej janyān kaumārikāṃś ca /
GV06vargs_u:444: pūrve janyāḥ syur apare kaumārikāḥ // VGrs_10.13
GV06vargs_u:445: caturo gomayapiṇḍān kṛtvā dvāv anyebhyas tathānyebhya iti prayacchet //
GV06vargs_u:453: ṣaḍarghyārhā bhavanti ṛtvigācāryo vivāhyo rājā snātakaḥ priyaśceti //
GV06vargs_u:455: anyatra yājyāt karmaṇo vivāhāc ca // VGrs_11.2
GV06vargs_u:458: kāṃsye camase vā dadhani madhvāsicya varṣīyasāpidhāya virājo doho 'si
GV06vargs_u:459: virājo doho 'si virājo doham aśīya mayi dohaḥ padyāyai virāja iti madhuparkarmāhiyamāṇaṃ pratīkṣate // VGrs_11.5
GV06vargs_u:460: sāvitreṇa viṣṭarau pratigṛhya rāṣṭrabhṛd asīty āsaṃdyām udagagram āstṛṇāti // VGrs_11.6
GV06vargs_u:461: ahaṃ varṣma sadṛśānām udyatānām iva sūryaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:462: idam ahaṃ tam adharaṃ karomi yo mā kaścābhidāsati /
GV06vargs_u:464: mā tvadyoṣam ity anyataram adhastāt pādayor upakarṣati // VGrs_11.8
GV06vargs_u:473_0: sāvitreṇobhayato viṣṭaraṃ madhuparkaṃ pratigṛhya adityās tvā pṛṣṭhe sādayāmīti bhūmau
GV06vargs_u:473_1: pratiṣṭhāpyāvasāyya suparṇasya tvā garutmataś cakṣuṣāvekṣa ityavekṣya namo rudrāya
GV06vargs_u:473_2: pātrasada iti prādeśena pratidiśaṃ vyuddiśyāṅguṣṭhenopamadhyamayā ca madhu vātā ṛtāyata
GV06vargs_u:474: satyaṃ yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatāmiti triḥ prāśnāti bhūyiṣṭham // VGrs_11.17
GV06vargs_u:478: hato me pāpmā pāpmānaṃ me hata /
GV06vargs_u:479: yāṃ tvā devā vasavo 'nvajīviṣur ādityānāṃ svasāraṃ rudramātaram /
GV06vargs_u:480: daivīṃ gāmaditiṃ janānām ārabhantām arhatām arhaṇāya /
GV06vargs_u:482: catur avarān brāhmaṇān nānāgotrān ityekaikaṃ paśvaṅgaṃ pāyasaṃ vā bhojayet
GV06vargs_u:483: yadyutsṛjet mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:484: pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gāmanāgāmaditiṃ vadhiṣṭa // VGrs_11.23
GV06vargs_u:485: om utsṛjata tṛṇānyat tūdakaṃ pibatu // VGrs_11.24
GV06vargs_u:487: śaṃ no mitra iti pāṇī prakṣālya yathārtham // VGrs_11.26
GV06vargs_u:489: athālaṃkaraṇam alaṃkaraṇam asi sarvasmā alaṃ bhūyāsam // VGrs_12.1
GV06vargs_u:490_0: prāṇāpānau me tarpayāmi samānavyānau me tarpayāmy udānarūpe me tarpayāmi cakṣuḥśrotre
GV06vargs_u:490_1: me tarpayāmi sucakṣā aham akṣibhyāṃ bhūyāsaṃ suvarcā mukhena suśrutkarṇābhyām iti
GV06vargs_u:491: paridhāsye yaśo dhāsye dīrghāyutvāya jaradaṣṭir asmi /
GV06vargs_u:492: śataṃ ca jīva śaradaḥ purūcīrvasūni cāyyo vibhajāya jīyām /
GV06vargs_u:493: ityahataṃ vāsa ācchādyāgniṃ prajvālya vyāhṛtibhir vrīhiyavān hutvā maṅgalāny āśāset // VGrs_12.3
GV06vargs_u:495_0: atha pravadane kanyāmupavasitāṃ snātāṃ saśiraskām ahatenācchinnadaśena vāsasā saṃvītāṃ
GV06vargs_u:495_1: saṃstīrṇasya purastād vihitāni vāditrāṇi vidhivadupakalpya purastāt sviṣṭakṛto vāce
GV06vargs_u:495_2: pathyāyai pūṣṇe pṛthivyā agnaye senāyai dhenāyai gāyatryai triṣṭubhe jagatyā anuṣṭubhe
GV06vargs_u:495_3: paṅktaye virāje rākāyai sinīvālyai kuhvai tvaṣṭra āśāyai sampattyai bhūtyai nirṛtyā
GV06vargs_u:495_4: anumatyai parjanyāyāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte ca juhuyāt ājyaśeṣeṇa pāṇī pralipya kanyāyā
GV06vargs_u:495_5: mukhaṃ saṃmārṣṭi priyāṃ karomi pataye devarāṇāṃ śvaśurāya ca /
GV06vargs_u:496: rucyai tvāgniḥ saṃsṛjatu ruciṣyā pataye bhava /
GV06vargs_u:497: saubhāgyena tvā saṃsṛjatv ilā devī ghṛtapadīndrāṇy agnāyyaśvinī rāṭ /
GV06vargs_u:500: sarvāṇi vāditrāṇy abhimantrayate yā caturdhā pravadaty agnau yā vāte yā bṛhatyuta /
GV06vargs_u:501: paśūnāṃ yāṃ brāhmaṇe nyadadhuḥ śivā sā pravadatv iha /
GV06vargs_u:503: sarvāṇi vāditrāṇy alaṃkṛtya kanyā pravādayate śubhaṃ vada dundubhe suprajāstvāya gomukha /
GV06vargs_u:504: prakrīḍantu kanyāḥ sumanasyamānāḥ sahendrāṇyā savayasaḥ sanīḍāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:505: prajāpatiryo vasati prajāsu prajās tanvate sumanasyamānāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:506: sa imāḥ prajā ramayatu prajātyai svayaṃ ca no ramatāṃ śaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:511: khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakratoḥ /
GV06vargs_u:514: athaināṃ darbhaśulvena saṃnahyati saṃ tvā nahyāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ saṃ tvā nahyāmy adbhiroṣadhībhiḥ
GV06vargs_u:515: saṃ tvā nahyāmi prajayā dhanena saha saṃnaddhā sunuhi bhāgadheyam /
GV06vargs_u:517: athaināṃ vāsaso 'ntaṃ grāhayitvābhyudānayati aghoracakṣur apatighny edhi /
GV06vargs_u:519: dīrghāyupatnī prajayā svarvid indrapraṇayīr upa no vastum ehi /
GV06vargs_u:521: samūhanollepanoddhananāvekṣaṇam ity agnikāle bhūmisaṃskārān sarvatra yathānimittam // VGrs_14.4
GV06vargs_u:522: paścādagneḥ kaṭe tejanyāṃ vā darbheṣv āsanam // VGrs_14.5
GV06vargs_u:523: śucau bhūmipradeśe śamīśamakaśyāmākānāṃ priyaṅgudūrvāgaurasarṣapāṇāṃ yathālābhagandhasakṣīraphalavadbhyo vanaspatibhyo haritparṇakuśayavādibhiś cānnair yā oṣadhayaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:524: samanyā yantīty anuvākena śaṃ no devīriti ca sahiraṇyāpo 'bhimantrya
GV06vargs_u:526: taṃ lājāhutīṣu hūyamānāsu bhrātā brahmacārī vodgṛhya dhārayed dakṣiṇataśca // VGrs_14.7
GV06vargs_u:527: lājān saṃskṛtān śamīparṇamiśrān śūrpeṇa dakṣiṇato mātānyā vāvidhavā //
GV06vargs_u:528: ājyaṃ saṃskṛtya brahmāṇam āmantrya samidham ādhāyāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgau hutvā // VGrs_14.9
GV06vargs_u:533: somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:537: rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyamatho imām /
GV06vargs_u:539: hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭābhiḥ pratyṛcam ājyāhutīr juhuyāt // VGrs_14.11
GV06vargs_u:540: yena karmaṇertset tatra jayāñ juhuyāditi jayānāṃ śrutiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:552: uttarato 'gner darbheṣu prācīṃ kanyām avasthāpya purastāt pratyaṅmukha
GV06vargs_u:553: upayantā devasya te savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ
GV06vargs_u:554: hastaṃ gṛhṇāmy aham asāv ity athāsyā upanayanavaddhastaṃ gṛhṇāti nīcāriktam ariktena /
GV06vargs_u:555: gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsat /
GV06vargs_u:556: bhago 'ryamā savitā puraṃdhir mahyaṃ tvādurgāharpatyāya devāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:558: yāṃ tvā viśvasya bhūtasya prāg āyāmy asyā agrataḥ /
GV06vargs_u:560: yena bhūtaṃ samabhavad yena viśvamidaṃ jagat tāmadya gāthāṃ gāsyāmo yā strīṇām uttamaṃ manaḥ
GV06vargs_u:561: sā tvam asy amo 'ham amo 'hamasmi sā tvam /
GV06vargs_u:562: dyaur ahaṃ pṛthivī tvaṃ bṛhad ahaṃ rathaṃtaraṃ tvam /
GV06vargs_u:565: sā mām anuvratā bhava sā mām anuprajāyasva /
GV06vargs_u:566: prajāṃ sṛjāvahā ubhau puṃse putrāya kartave /
GV06vargs_u:570: paścād agner darbheṣvaśmānamavasthāpayati ātiṣṭhemam aśmānamaśmeva tvaṃ sthirā bhava /
GV06vargs_u:571: kṛṇvantu viśve devā āyuṣṭe śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:574: uparyagnāv añjalau lājān bhrātā brahmacārī vopastīrṇa āvapet // VGrs_14.17
GV06vargs_u:578: dīrghāyurastu me patir edhantāṃ jñātayo mama /
GV06vargs_u:583: vīrasūr jīvapatnīr bhūyāsam iti sarvatra vācayet // VGrs_14.19
GV06vargs_u:585: punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha /
GV06vargs_u:592: kāmena caturthī pūrayitvā dvir abhighāryottarārdhapūrvārdhe juhuyāt //
GV06vargs_u:593: athaināṃ prācīṃ sapta padāni prakramayati ekam iṣe viṣṇustvāṃ nayatu /
GV06vargs_u:601: sakhī saptapadī bhava sakhyaṃ te gameyaṃ sakhyātte mā riṣam iti saptama enāṃ prekṣamāṇāṃ samīkṣate pra tvā muñcātu varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:602: dhātuśca yonau sukṛtasya loke hṛṣṭā saṃ saha patyā bhūyāsam /
GV06vargs_u:603: iti śulvaṃ visraṃsyodakumbhena mārjayante punantu mā pitara ityanuvākena /
GV06vargs_u:605: sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhur imāṃ sametya paśyata /
GV06vargs_u:610: yena dyaur ugrety evaṃprabhṛtaya udvāhe homāḥ syuḥ /
GV06vargs_u:614: aṅkau nyaṅkāv abhito rathaṃ ye dhvāntā vātā agram abhi ye saṃpatanti /
GV06vargs_u:615: dūrehetiḥ patatrī vājinīvāṃs te no 'gnayaḥ paprayaḥ pārayantu /
GV06vargs_u:617: sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ sudhuraṃ sucakram /
GV06vargs_u:618: āroha sūrye amṛtasya panthāṃs tena yāhi gṛhān svasti /
GV06vargs_u:620: upa māyantu devatā upa brahma suvīryam /
GV06vargs_u:621: upa kṣatraṃ ca yadbalamupa māmaitu yadbalam /
GV06vargs_u:623: anu māyantu devatā anu brahma suvīryam /
GV06vargs_u:624: anu kṣatraṃ ca yad yaśamanu māmaitu yadyaśam /
GV06vargs_u:625: iti prāñcaṃ prayāpya pradakṣiṇamāvṛtya yathārthalakṣaṇyavṛkṣaṃ caityaṃ vopatiṣṭheta // VGrs_15.4
GV06vargs_u:627: ye vṛkṣeṣu śaṣpiñjarā iti ca // VGrs_15.5
GV06vargs_u:629: ye pathāṃ pathirakṣaya iti ca // VGrs_15.6
GV06vargs_u:631: ye bhūtānām adhipataya iti ca // VGrs_15.7
GV06vargs_u:635: yatrāpas taritavyā āsīd ati samudrāya vayunāya sindhūnāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:639: yāvatāṃ sakhāyānaṃ svastimicchet tāvata udakāñjalīr juhuyāt amṛtam āsye juhomyāyuḥ prāṇe pratidadhāmi amṛtaṃ brahmaṇā saha mṛtyuṃ tarema /
GV06vargs_u:640: prāsahād itīṣṭir asyaditir eva mṛtyuṃdhayamiti trir ācāmet // VGrs_15.11
GV06vargs_u:642: yadyakṣā śamyāṇir vā riṣyeta tatraivāgnim upasamādhāyāgneyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya pustāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ //
GV06vargs_u:647: irāṃ vahantī ghṛtam ukṣamāṇāṃs teṣv ahaṃ sumanāḥ saṃviśāmi /
GV06vargs_u:653_0: acyutā dhruvā dhruvapatnī dhruvaṃ paśyema viśvata iti dhruvaṃ jīvantīṃ saptarṣīn
GV06vargs_u:653_1: arundhatīmiti darśayitvā prājāpatyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiś cājyasya
GV06vargs_u:653_2: purastāt sviṣṭakṛta ājyaśeṣe dadhyāsicya dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam iti dadhnaḥ pumāṃstriḥ
GV06vargs_u:654: cakram ivānaḍuhaḥ padaṃ māmevānvetu te manaḥ /
GV06vargs_u:655: māṃ ca paśyasi sūryaṃ ca mā cānyeṣu manaskṛthāḥ /
GV06vargs_u:656: cākravākaṃ saṃvasanaṃ tan nau saṃvananaṃ kṛtam /
GV06vargs_u:661: evameva caturthyāṃ kṛtvā hiraṇyagarbha ityaṣṭābhiḥ sthālīpākasya hutvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya purastātsviṣṭakṛtaḥ // VGrs_15.25
GV06vargs_u:662: athāsyāḥ savye 'ṃse pūṣā te granthiṃ grathnātv iti vāsaso granthiṃ kriyamāṇam anumantrayate catasro 'vidhavāḥ kurvanti /
GV06vargs_u:668: apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapaso 'bhibhūtam /
GV06vargs_u:669: iha prajāmiha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ prajāyasva prajayā putrakāma /
GV06vargs_u:670: apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanūm ṛtviye nādhamānām /
GV06vargs_u:671: upa mām uccā yuvatir babhūyāt prajāyasva prajayā putrakāme /
GV06vargs_u:672: prajāpate tanvaṃ me juṣasva tvaṣṭā vīraiḥ sahasāham indraḥ /
GV06vargs_u:673: indreṇa devairvīrudhaḥ saṃvyayantāṃ bahūnāṃ puṃsāṃ pitarau syāva /
GV06vargs_u:674: ahaṃ prajā ajanayaṃ pṛthivyām ahaṃ garbham adadhāmoṣadhīṣu /
GV06vargs_u:675: ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantar ahaṃ prajābhyo bibharṣi putrān /
GV06vargs_u:680_0: athāsyāstṛtīye garbhamāse puṃsā nakṣatreṇa yad ahaścandramā na dṛśyeta tadahar vopoṣyāplāvyāhataṃ
GV06vargs_u:680_1: vāsa ācchādya nyagrodhāvarohaśuṅgānyudapeṣaṃ piṣṭvā dakṣiṇāsminnāsikāchidra āsiñcet
GV06vargs_u:681: athāsyā dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣim abhimṛśet pumān agniḥ pumānindraḥ pumāndevo bṛhaspatiḥ /
GV06vargs_u:684: pumāṃsaṃ garbhaṃ jāyasva tvaṃ pumān anujāyatām /
GV06vargs_u:686: athāsyāḥ pañcame ṣaṣṭhe saptame vā garbhamāse maṅgalyaiḥ snāpayitvā prājāpatyena sthālīpākeneṣṭvā jayaprabhṛtibhiścājyasya purastātsviṣṭakṛtaḥ
GV06vargs_u:687: paścādagnerdarbheṣv āsīnāyāḥ sarvān keśān vipramucya tvamaryamā bhavasi yatkanīnāṃ devaḥ svadhāvo guhyaṃ bibharṣi /
GV06vargs_u:688: añjanti vipraṃ sukṛtaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī sumanasā kṛṇoṣi /
GV06vargs_u:689: iti navanītena pāṇī pralipya sarvān keśān saṃprayauti // VGrs_16.7
GV06vargs_u:690: indrāṇī cakre kaṅkataṃ sa sīmantaṃ visarpatu iti kaṅkataṃ gṛhṇāti //
GV06vargs_u:694: dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvātu śaradaḥ śatam /
GV06vargs_u:696: athāsyāḥ patir dvedhā keśān badhnāti nīlalohitena sūtreṇa jīvorṇayā vā //
GV06vargs_u:699: tatra sāyaṃprātaḥprabhṛtīnām agnihotravat parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya sāyaṃ prātaḥ syādityeke haviṣyasya vā siddhasya vaiśvadevaḥ // VGrs_17.3
GV06vargs_u:700: agnaye somāya prajāpataye dhanvantaraye vāstoṣpataye viśvebhyo devebhyo
GV06vargs_u:703: dadhimadhumiśrasyāgnaye purastāt yamāya dakṣiṇataḥ somāya paścāt varuṇāyottarataḥ madhye varuṇāryamabhyāṃ brahmaṇe ca /
GV06vargs_u:704: agnaye pṛthivyai vāyave 'ntarikṣāya sūryāya dive candramase nakṣatrebhya iti // VGrs_17.6
GV06vargs_u:717: ye devā yāni bhūtāni prapadye tāni me svastyayanaṃ kurvantviti /
GV06vargs_u:723: snehavad amāṃsam annaṃ bhojayitvā viduṣo brāhmaṇān arthasiddhiṃ vācayet //
GV06vargs_u:724: baliharaṇasyānte yāmāśiṣam icchet tām āśāsīta // VGrs_17.19
GV06vargs_u:725: gṛhapatiḥ oṃ akṣayam annam astv ity āha // VGrs_17.20
GV06vargs_u:726: bhikṣāṃ pradāya sāyaṃ bhojanameva prātar āśet // VGrs_17.21
